U

update(int) - Method in class Arrow
 
update(GameArena) - Method in class Rock
When mode is 0, it is a normal laser attack When mode is 1, it is a bomb attack by kingAlien Each frame is called to move the instance to the tower at a constant speed.
updateItem() - Method in class GameArena
All items can be updated (every frame will be called).
